subject: Re: [junit] Open Forum message
msgSnippet: ... Then the developer list? (I only noticed one list on the site)
messageBody:
Johannes Link wrote:
>
> > I highly recommend allowing him to add
> > this mailing list (junit@yahoogroups.com) to the list of
> > automatic notifications.
> >
> > Basically what will happen is that if JUnit fails to compile,
> > due to changes in dependencies of other projects changing,
> > then GUMP will notify you of that change. Also, when a change
> > you committed breaks other projects, you will be notified.
>
> Since this group is not the Junit developer list but a Junit user list, I
> don't see why all readers should be notified of Apache's compilation problems.

Then the developer list?

(I only noticed one list on the site)
